name: Captions for Instagram
description: Captions has a great collection of captions categorized in 30+ categories,helps you get the right caption for your photo in less than minute.  With this cool captions for photos you can attract more followers and likes on your profile. You can also share these captions as quote with your loved ones.  Features :  Add any caption to favorite list for easy access.  Works without internet.  Copy and Share captions directly into any social media accounts.  Caption for every mood.  Captions are updated on regular basis so that you can always have trendy captions for Instagram and Facebook photos.  There are cool attitude status, food status, funny quotes, Anniversary status, love quotes, Flirty messages, travel quotes, cool status for boys and girls, birthday status, friendship quotes, sad quotes, status for Facebook, Instagram quotes are available which makes your story on social media looks more attractive.   These captions for Instagram categorized in following categories  * Anniversary Captions * Attitude status * Beard Captions * Bike Captions * Birthday Captions * Brother Captions * College Captions * Cool Captions * Cute Captions * Family Captions * Flirt Captions * Food Captions * Friendship quotes * Funny quotes * Gym Captions * Happiness quotes * Inspirational Captions * Life quotes * Love Captions * Miss You Captions * Party Captions * Pets Captions * Sad Captions * Selfie Captions * Shopping Captions * Sister Captions * Smile Captions * Summer Captions * Success Captions  * Boy Captions * Girl Captions * Travel Captions
